creator: david@mobile-360.com
text:
POI is dependent upon xmlbeans-2.6.0 which has been retired since 2014. 

Also, the xmlbeans-2.6.0.jar contains two copies of class org.apache.xmlbeans.xml.stream.Location, which causes jarsigner to fail.

Somebody should either fix xmlbeans or move POI to use Apache Attic, as advertised.

Thanks,
David

Please see threads on the POI dev list such as https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/8ad08d39e616e5a48cfbf1b12385711474dd3153e5ad650174f682d3@%3Cdev.poi.apache.org%3E and http://apache-poi.1045710.n5.nabble.com/DISCUSS-Getting-a-fixed-version-of-XMLBeans-td5729378.html for discussions on the fix for this in Apache POI 4.0
creator: apache@gagravarr.org

text:
Also bug 59268 handles this in bugzilla.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 59268 ***
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
